chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: modulo operator

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: what does modulo operator do?

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I write 15% 6

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: it means

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I divide 15 by 6

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: or I give you a simple example

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I divide by 3, then 2 will remain

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so it gives remainder

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I divide 5 by 3, then 2 will remain

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I divide by 6, then 2 will remain

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: but if I divide by 6, then 2 will remain

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: and only 2 will remain

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: 15 by 6 is 2.5, 15 by 6 is 90

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so these are all modulo operators

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: which are addition, subtraction, multiplication

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: now exponential operator is division

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so I will correct it

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: and I will tell you what is exponential operator

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I write 5 by 5, then 5 will be 5

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so 5 to the power 3

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so I will fix it and come back

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: how did I write divide in exponential?

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: now some of you might be saying that you made a mistake

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: you are a person, you make mistakes

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so I have written star star in exponential

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: and I have told you all these operators

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: try out 5 by 5, 3 times

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I write 4 by 4, then 5 will be multiplied

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I multiply 5 by 4, then what will happen?

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so it's a simple thing

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: if I write 2x4, then 2x2x2x2x2

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so 4x2, how much will it be? 16

chunks.title: PythonDay6
chunks.text: so try it out

text: modulo operator what does modulo operator do? if I write 15% 6 it means if I divide 15 by 6 or I give you a simple example if I divide by 3, then 2 will remain so it gives remainder if I divide 5 by 3, then 2 will remain if I divide by 6, then 2 will remain but if I divide by 6, then 2 will remain and only 2 will remain 15 by 6 is 2.5, 15 by 6 is 90 so these are all modulo operators which are addition, subtraction, multiplication now exponential operator is division so I will correct it and I will tell you what is exponential operator if I write 5 by 5, then 5 will be 5 so 5 to the power 3 so I will fix it and come back how did I write divide in exponential? now some of you might be saying that you made a mistake you are a person, you make mistakes so I have written star star in exponential and I have told you all these operators try out 5 by 5, 3 times if I write 4 by 4, then 5 will be multiplied if I multiply 5 by 4, then what will happen? so it's a simple thing if I write 2x4, then 2x2x2x2x2 so 4x2, how much will it be? 16 so try it out
